constituent: set, finger, fingers, reside, flag, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth
koohiiStory1: The man set his finger firmly on the map and said "Here is where they reside, I am certain of it".
koohiiStory2: Cf. reside (#1063): you set the flag with your fingers on the place where you reside: an old tradition.
readingExamples: 据える (す.える), 据わる (す.わる)
words: to install, to equip, to mount
to set (table), to lay (foundation), to place (gun), to apply (moxa)
